Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 106th overall pick, by West Texas in 1977...
Traded from West Texas to Coney Island on 2/12/1982 (Going to CI: C H. Prouty, LF A. Mejorado. Going to WT: 1B W. Tiller)...
Had first career hit on 4/6/1984, off Russell Anderson (PON)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/1984, off Dean Vinson (DIA)...
Drove in 6 runs against Pontiac on 6/3/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1988, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
